gitlab.instanceUrl.description: Your GitLab instance URL (default is https://gitlab.com)

gitlab.showStatusBarLinks.description: Whether to display all GitLab related link in the status bar (Requires restart of VSCode)

gitlab.showIssueLinkOnStatusBar.description: Whether to display the GitLab issue link in the status bar

gitlab.showMrStatusOnStatusBar.description: Whether to display the GitLab Merge Request status in the status bar

gitlab.certKey.description: Custom Certificate Key file to use (example: /etc/ssl/certs/certificateKey.key)

gitlab.ignoreCertificateErrors.description: Ignore TLS/SSL certificate errors when calling the GitLab API

gitlab.remoteName.description: Name of the git remote to use in order to locate the Gitlab project

gitlab.pipelineGitRemoteName.description: Name of the git remote to use in order to locate the Gitlab project for your pipeline. Keep empty for default

gitlab.showPipelineUpdateNotifications.description: Show notification in VSCode when pipeline status changed

gitlab.showProjectMergeRequests.description: Enable the "All Project Merge Requests" sidebar pane

gitlab.enableExperimentalFeatures.description: Enable experimental features including showing Issue details in VSCode

name.description: The label to show in the GitLab panel

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results to show

orderBy.description: Return issues ordered by the selected value. It is not applicable for vulnerabilities

sort.description: Return issues sorted in ascending or descending order. It is not applicable for vulnerabilities

scope.description: Return Gitlab items for the given scope. It is not applicable for epics. "assigned_to_me" and "created_by_me" are not applicable for vulnerabilities. "dismissed" is not applicable for issues and merge requests

type.description: The type of GitLab items to return. If snippets is selected, none of the other filter will work. Epics will work only on GitLab ultimate/gold.

noItemText.description: The text to show if the query returns no items

state.description: Return "all" issues or just those that are "opened" or "closed". It is not applicable for vulnerabilities

labels.description: Array of label names, Gitlab item must have all labels to be returned. "None" lists all GitLab items with no labels. "Any" lists all GitLab issues with at least one label. Predefined names are case-insensitive. It is not applicable for vulnerabilities

milestone.description: The milestone title. "None" lists all GitLab items with no milestone. "Any" lists all GitLab items that have an assigned milestone. It is not applicable for epics and vulnerabilities

author.description: Return GitLab items created by the given username. It is not applicable for vulnerabilities

assignee.description: Returns GitLab items assigned to the given username. "None" returns unassigned GitLab items. "Any" returns GitLab items with an assignee. It is not applicable for epics and vulnerabilities

search.description: Search GitLab items against their title and description. It is not applicable for vulnerabilities

searchIn.description: Modify the scope of the search attribute. It is not applicable for epics and vulnerabilities

createdAfter.description: Return GitLab items created after the given date. It is not applicable for vulnerabilities

createdBefore.description: Return GitLab items created before the given date. It is not applicable for vulnerabilities

updatedAfter.description: Return GitLab items updated after the given date. It is not applicable for vulnerabilities

updatedBefore.description: Return GitLab items updated before the given date. It is not applicable for vulnerabilities

wip.description: Filter merge requests against their wip status. "yes" to return only WIP merge requests, "no" to return non WIP merge requests. Works only with merge requests

confidential.description: Filter confidential or public issues. Works only with issues

excludeLabels.description: Array of label names, Gitlab item must not have to be returned. Predefined names are case-insensitive. Works only with issues

excludeMilestone.description: The milestone title to exclude. Works only with issues

excludeAuthor.description: Return GitLab items not created by the given username. Works only with issues

excludeAssignee.description: Returns GitLab items not assigned to the given username. Works only with issues

excludeSearch.description: Search GitLab items that doesn't have the search key in their title or description. Works only with issues

excludeSearchIn.description: Modify the scope of the excludeSearch attribute. Works only with issues

reportTypes.description: Returns vulnerabilities belonging to specified report types. Works only with vulnerabilities

severityLevels.description: Returns vulnerabilities belonging to specified severity levels. Defaults to all. Works only with vulnerabilities

confidenceLevels.description: Returns vulnerabilities belonging to specified confidence levels. Defaults to all. Works only with vulnerabilities

pipelineId.description: Returns vulnerabilities belonging to specified pipeline. "branch" returns vulnerabilities belonging to latest pipeline of the current branch. Works only with vulnerabilities
